          <title>
            <string language="en">Half-life of protactinium-234</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbwertzeit von protactinium-234</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demi vie de protactinium-234</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Half-life de protactinium-234</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Periodo radioattivo di protactinium-234</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ημιζωή protactinium-234</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Período de protactinium-234</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph illustrates the relationship of time and the number of undecayed nuclei N in protactinium-234 during radioactive decay. This can be used in an exercise that calculates its half-life.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive decay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">half-life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">protactinium-234</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio-isotopes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">undecayed nuclei</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm veranschaulicht das 
Verhältnis der Zeit und die Zahl von undecayed Kerne N in 
protactinium-234 während des radioaktiven Zerfalls. Dieses kann
in einer Übung verwendet werden, die seine Halbwertzeit errechnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne illustre le rapport du temps 
et le nombre de undecayed les noyaux N dans protactinium-234 pendant 
l'affaiblissement radioactif. Ceci peut être utilisé dans un 
exercice qui calcule sa demi vie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico ilustra o relacionamento do 
tempo e o número de undecayed os núcleos N em protactinium-234 
durante a deterioração radioativa. Isto pode ser usado em um 
exercício que calcule seu half-life.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare illustra il rapporto di 
tempo ed il numero di undecayed i nuclei N in protactinium-234 durante
il deperimento radioattivo. Ciò può essere usata in 
un'esercitazione che calcola il relativo periodo radioattivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών επεξηγεί τη σχέση 
του χρόνου και ο αριθμός οι πυρήνες ν σε protactinium-234 κατά 
τη διάρκεια της ραδιενεργού αποσύνθεσης. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση που υπολογίζει την ημιζωή της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico ilustra el lazo del tiempo y
el número de undecayed los núcleos N en protactinium-234 durante 
decaimiento radiactivo. Esto se puede utilizar en un ejercicio 
que calcule su período.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
